column3: @promag After further investigation, it looks like FlushUnconfirmed() doesn't need the mempool at all, so I re-wrote it a bit.
Nit, can early exit loop if `mapMemPoolTxs` is empty.

I didn't want to duplicate the code in `removeTx()` or figure out how to refactor it to be more efficient for this purpose -- since `FlushUnconfirmed()` is only called in shutdown, I don't think the performance savings here from more code changes is worth the review/maintenance burden.\n\nIf you'd rather see a bigger refactor here to clean things up, I think I'd prefer to just remove this commit
I think it's fine as it is. I'll take note to measure an alternative implementation.
